text:
Hi, I have a HublDB that holds a listing of videos. On the dynamic page, I want to open the video in a lightbox, but when I try to grab the friendly link by file id it tells gives me the following error:
`Warning in file_by_id: no file exists with ID 36723383848`
This is the actual ID of the video.  If I hard code the id, it works fine:
 `{% set file = file_by_id(36723383846) %}` 
 `{{ file.friendlyUrl }}`

The second you put a variable in for file_by_id it throws an error. The following fails:
`{% set file = file_by_id(row.video|int) %}` 
`{{ file.friendlyUrl }}`
The file ID number is slightly off. 3672338384*8* vs 3672338384*6.* Thee last digits are different.
Ah thank you I missed that. Now do you have any idea why the row.video is returning the wrong file id?
:wave: Hi, Thor! Weâ€™re working on getting the updated documents published, just waiting on some final changes that need to be made to the new APIs that support the new multi-language functionality.
Have you tried removing the int filter?
